sentences.english: Just like personality molding, the brand image – building is not the matter of a single day.
sentences.chinese: 品牌塑造一如人格的塑造，非一朝一夕之功。

sentences.english: The transition to low carbon energy can't just happen overnight.
sentences.chinese: 向低碳能源转变不会是一朝一夕的事。

sentences.english: It can take awhile to damage a strong brand.
sentences.chinese: 损害一个强大的品牌可能只需要一朝一夕。

absolutely not
for years/over the years

to act with undue haste (idiom); eager and impatient/overhasty
year in, year out (idiom)/(over) many years
variant of 蹴[cu4]
carefully/to kick/to tread on/to stamp
to accomplish the whole task at one stroke (idiom)

definition: dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
